numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a high percentage of players of color in each sport in the graph.
2. I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is low.
5. This situation lowers the chance that a person of color becomes a head coach.
6. The graph shows a clear difference between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of head coaches of color in each major sport in the graph.
7. The headline is: Diversity in major sports league.
